title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Multimedia-Based Special Education Content Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can list five key characteristics explaining the cognitive traits of students with special needs.
Learners can design at least three individualized science-integrated educational strategies using CAPs (Content Acquisition Podcasts).
Learners can produce special education content by applying multimedia learning principles (e.g., dual-channel processing theory).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
